label: Simon decided to invest $8,000 in the stock market one day early in 2008. Six months after he invested, on July 17, the stocks he had purchased were down 50%. At this point, Simon has: a. broken even in the stock market, b. is ahead of where he began, c. has lost money
value_labels: Textual response
